- **Best Portfolio:** Multi-strategy (19.8% return, Sharpe 2.12)
- **Risk Management:** VaR, CVaR, Kelly Criterion - all operational

### [Phase 4: E2B Swarm & Multi-Agent](https://github.com/ruvnet/neural-trader/issues/67)
- **Topologies:** 4 tested (Hierarchical, Mesh, Ring, Star)
- **Recommended:** Mesh (0.8s latency, high fault tolerance)
- **Byzantine Consensus:** 100% malicious agent detection
- **Distributed Training:** 3.78x speedup over single node
